greeting.slogan: A place where those who are on the <2>twin flame</2> journey can <4>connect</4>!

disclaimer.sentence1: This website is a public forum open to anyone interested in <3>twin flames</3> and/or spiritual connections, friendships, and relationships.
disclaimer.sentence2: In no way is this website affiliated with any cults or cult practices.
disclaimer.sentence3: This website in no way condones any behaviors such as harassment or stalking.
disclaimer.sentence4: This website is intended as a public forum for like-minded invividuals to <5>connect</5> with others who share similar beliefs with the idea of helping to facilitate further growth mentally, emotionally, and spiritually in all aspects of their lives.
disclaimer.sentence5: This is a community monitered forum; All belief systems and ideologies need to be respected.
disclaimer.sentence6: Offensive behavior, such as trolling, will not be tolerated.

languageSelect.alt_lang_info_sentence: For more information on alternate languages, click <14>here</14>.

userAgreement.ua_statement: This is NOT a dating site!
userAgreement.ua_question: Are you sure this where you want to be?

ua_body.section1: This website is a public forum designed specifically for connecting people interested in spiritual relationships and other like-minded individuals.
ua_body.section2: It is also a directory database of spiritual and relationship professionals to help guide along the path of spiritual awakening and soul fulfillment.
ua_body.section3: Our users particpate on this public forum of their own accord. Our platform is community monitered. Any innapropriate behavior such as stalking, harassing, propositioning will not be tolerated.
ua_body.section4: Trolling and/or downgrading accusations will also not be tolerated. Claiming we are a cult or calling anyone on our platform a cultist, puppet, target, or any other demeaning derogatory term will automatically result in the termination of your account.
ua_body.section5: Politics are also not to be discussed on this forum. Save your political views and opinions for other forums please.
ua_body.section6: You must be at least 18 years of age to create an account on this platform.
ua_body.section7: By agreeing and creating an account, you agree to these terms set forth here as well as our official <11>Terms of Use</11>, our <12>Privacy Policy</12>, and our Use of <13>Cookies</13>.

revocationNotice.revoked_notice: Site access and platform privilages have been revoked.

suspensionNotice.under_review_notice: This user account is currently under review.
suspensionNotice.suspended_notice: Site access and platform privilages are suspended until further notice.
